All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account_Frame
 
Assignment
Instances of this class will store information pertaining to individual assignments.
ClassRoster
This class will store the data for a subject, including the name, list of students in it, list of assignments for it, and seating chart.
Console
 
Control
This method is what's used to fufill all the different actions the user tries to do with the UI.
ControlTest
ControlTest.java is for testing methods within the Control class
Courses_Frame
 
CreateAccountFrame
This frame displays a screen for creating a new account.
CreateClass
This is the frame for making a new subject.
Edit_Account_Frame
 
Help_Frame
 
Home_Frame
This is the home menu for the app.
Launch
This Class creates a new console session and starts up the first UI window, the login screen.
LinePanel
 
Log_In_Frame
This is the first window displayed when the program is started up.
Saving
This class handles saving data to enable data persistence.
SeatingChart
This Class will implement the seating chart functionality.
Student
Instances of this class stores information pertaining to individual students.
Teacher
This is the user class, it will store information pertaining to the user the instance belongs to including name and password, and the classes they teach.
